name: biojs-io-graduates
description: A parser for the BioJS tutorial graduate list
readme:
# biojs-io-graduates

[![NPM version](http://img.shields.io/npm/v/biojs-io-graduates.svg)](https://www.npmjs.org/package/biojs-io-graduates) 
[![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/biojs-edu/biojs-io-graduates.png?branch=master)](http://travis-ci.org/greenify/biojs-io-graduates) 

> An example parser for the BioJS tutorial graduate list 

You can browse the tutorial at our [education pages](http://edu.biojs.net/graduates/basic_io/).

## Getting Started
Install the module with: `npm install biojs-io-graduates`

```javascript
var graduates = require('biojs-io-graduates');
```

## Documentation

#### .parse(<graduate file>)

**Parameter**: `name`
**Type**: `String`
**Example**: `biojs`

Parses a list of aliases by counting the number of appearances for each country.

How to use this method

```javascript
graduates.parse("greenify:DE\ndaviddao:HK");
// should return {"DE": 1, "HL: 1}
```

## Contributing

All contributions are welcome.

## Support

If you have any problem or suggestion please open an issue [here](https://github.com/biojs-edu/biojs-io-graduates/issues).
